hasAttributes.name: LinePaymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: allowLateCharges
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if late charges are allowed.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: batchId
hasAttributes.description: System-generated ID for batch.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: claimCreationFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates if claims should be created for customer raised disputes.

hasAttributes.name: customerid
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: Description of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAccountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL-revenue-account. Can be including sub-account ID. It can contain many different levels to identify the account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: lineBusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match the BusinessUnitCode in the BusinessUnit table.

hasAttributes.name: lineCustomerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: lineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of payment line.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: lineLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line item number of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementPaymentMechanism
hasAttributes.description: Payment mechanism.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDate
hasAttributes.description: The date settled.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSourceDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: The source document to which the line relates.

hasAttributes.name: lineSupplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier who provided the goods for sale. Must match the supplierId in supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount or a quantity, e.g. litres.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax code for lookup in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
hasAttributes.description: The identification of the period of the declaration/return in which the tax amount is reported to the revenue body.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
hasAttributes.description: Tax point date where recorded or, if not recorded, then the invoice date.

hasAttributes.name: maxRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued.

hasAttributes.name: maxWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: minRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued.

hasAttributes.name: minWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: paymentMethod
hasAttributes.description: The code value or indicator of the method by which the transaction debit or credit amount was extinguished or apportioned to the debt by the supplier, e.g. check, wire transfer, cash, etc.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on an externally-generated transaction, e.g. check date or wire transfer date.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefNo
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment made, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the receiptDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: periodYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the receiptDate occurs.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: receiptId
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment received, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the customer.

hasAttributes.name: referenceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on an externally-generated transaction, e.g. check date or wire transfer date.

hasAttributes.name: revenueClassification
hasAttributes.description: Revenue policy value that defers revenue on transactions of customers that match the classification, e.g. def rev for subscriptions.

hasAttributes.name: salesPostingRules
hasAttributes.description: The rules defined for sales posting, e.g. day end, batch, individual, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

hasAttributes.name: standardRefund
hasAttributes.description: Stores the maximum number of days allowed for refund.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemId
hasAttributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the adjustments on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific account, site, currency and date. Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal are not included.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentValue
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the adjustment amounts on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific account, site, currency and date. Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal, are not included because they are used for internal accounting purposes only.

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the payment schedules (instalments) of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackValue
hasAttributes.description: Value of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalEarnedDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the earned discounts that were given on the closed payment schedules (instalments) of all invoices for the specific account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: transactionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the payment was made or credit was applied.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: accountId
hasAttributes.description: accountId associated with customer company/customer books of accounts used to identify the entity. The entity's supplier number in the customer's records.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginning
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount (that is, the ending balance from the prior period) recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountEnding
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: amountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: balanceAsOfDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the provided balance.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: companyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of company of the customer, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar.

hasAttributes.name: customerAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.

hasAttributes.name: customerCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The credit limit for this customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerGroup
hasAttributes.description: The name of the group to which this customer has been assigned by the entity.

hasAttributes.name: customerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: customerName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerType
hasAttributes.description: The type of customer.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the BalanceAsOfDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which BalanceAsOfDate occurs

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
